MAIN_MESSAGE: We are currently experiencing problems with the electricity supply in your area.  Our engineers are now working on the fault and we hope to have your electricity restored by 20-NOV-2020 15:30.  Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience this is causing.
TRANSCRIPT: There is a power cut in the PA9 postcode area of Johnstone and Howood. It will be necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 10am to complete repairs to a underground cable fault and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3:30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:39am on Friday, 20 November 2020
